data.description: Providing any() and all() for lists
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module was created in response to a discussion regarding
    List::Utils, which seems to be both (a) vaguely named and (b) cannot
    be loaded in conjunction with List::Util. I didn't stop to confirm
    (b) before I coded this subclass of List::Util, introducing the
    any() and all() operators from Quantum::Superpositions in a way that
    doesn't interfere at all with List::Util's operation.
